SampleID_num: Integer Identifier of the measured leaf
Species: Full species name for example Cecropia insignis
Growth_environment: Growth environment for the measured plant (natural or glasshouse or managed)
Plant_type: Type of plant (wild species or agricultural species)
Vcmax_method: Method used to estimate Vcmax (one point or A-Ci curve)
Vcmax25: Maximum rate of carboxylation at the reference temperature 25 degrees celcius calculated assuming infinite mesophyl conductance i.e. apparent Vcmax
Jmax25: Maximum rate of electron transport per leaf area at the reference temperature 25 degrees celcius calculated assuming infinite mesophyll conductance and saturating light
TPU25: Triose phosphate utilization rate per leaf area at the reference temperature 25 degrees celcius
Spectra: Reflectrance spectra from 350 nm to 2500 nm
N: Nitrogen content in percentage of dry mass
